tool_description: Api to give you country codes
name: Country Codes
title: Country Codes

api_list.name: Country code
api_list.description: get country data by country code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-codes.p.rapidapi.com/country/cc/44"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://country-codes.p.rapidapi.com/country/cc/{country_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: country
